name: Jerry's endless travels:Save Gerald (vz200)
description:
A port to vz200 my dragon 32 game project Jerry's endless travels Save Gerald.

In this game Jerry must save robot Gerald from planet full of ghosts and monsters.

Use teleport near walls (Q button) to move on another location until device will move up. Also avoid most skulls since they are dangerous.

Controls:o-left,p-right,q-teleport up (near wall), space-jump,b-fire.
